The senator from South Dakota has fallen ill with strokelike symptoms. The implications of this mean if he steps down, the Republican Governor appoints anyone he wants. That would mean the senate would be tied and Cheney would be the deciding vote.
 
 interesting....

Yes, very interesting that his illness intruded just before the new year and a new Congress. Interesting also that former South Dakota Senator Tom Daschle got anthrax in the mail in 2001. That Senator Leahy of Vermont, cursed by Dick Cheney on the Senate floor, also received anthrax in the mail.
 
 Interesting that Cheney holds onto so much power.
 
 Yes. Interesting.
Perhaps we should just hope for Senator Johnson's recovery instead of making stupid claims and suggesting that the senate might change power.
